query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Mentr’ io dubbiava per lo viso spento, 2 de la fulgida fiamma che lo spense 3 uscì un spiro che mi fece attento,
4 dicendo: «Intanto che tu ti risense 5 de la vista che haï in me consunta, 6 ben è che ragionando la compense.
query.result:
**English:**
1 While I was hesitating with my gaze extinguished, 2 from the radiant flame that extinguished it 3 came a breath that made me attentive,
4 saying: "While you are recovering 5 from the sight that you have consumed in me, 6 it is good that you compensate for it by reasoning.
**Malay:**
1 Ketika aku ragu-ragu dengan pandanganku yang padam, 2 dari nyala api yang cemerlang yang memadamkannya 3 keluarlah hembusan napas yang membuatku perhatian,
4 berkata: "Sementara kamu pulih 5 dari penglihatan yang telah kamu habiskan dalam diriku, 6 sebaiknya kamu mengimbanginya dengan penalaran.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Comincia dunque; e dì ove s’appunta 8 l’anima tua, e fa ragion che sia 9 la vista in te smarrita e non defunta:
10 perché la donna che per questa dia 11 regïon ti conduce, ha ne lo sguardo 12 la virtù ch’ebbe la man d’Anania».
query.result:
**English:**
7 Begin then; and tell where your soul is fixed, 8 and make reason to be your guide, 9 since sight is lost to you and not extinguished:
10 for the lady who guides you through this region 11 has in her gaze the power that Ananias' hand possessed».
**Malay:**
7 Mulailah sekarang; dan katakan di mana jiwamu tertuju, 8 dan jadikan akal sebagai pemandumu, 9 karena penglihatan telah hilang darimu dan tidak padam:
10 karena wanita yang menuntunmu melalui wilayah ini 11 memiliki tatapan yang memiliki kekuatan yang dimiliki tangan Ananias».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Io dissi: «Al suo piacere e tosto e tardo 14 vegna remedio a li occhi, che fuor porte 15 quand’ ella entrò col foco ond’ io sempr’ ardo.
query.result:
**English:**
13 I said: "At her pleasure, soon or late, 14 may a remedy come to these eyes, which were blinded 15 when she entered with the fire with which I always burn.
**Malay:**
13 Aku berkata: "Pada kesenangannya, cepat atau lambat, 14 semoga datanglah obat untuk mata-mata ini, yang dibutakan 15 ketika dia masuk dengan api yang selalu membakarku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Lo ben che fa contenta questa corte, 17 Alfa e O è di quanta scrittura 18 mi legge Amore o lievemente o forte».
query.result:
**English:**
16 That which makes this court content, 17 is the Alpha and Omega of all that Scripture 18 Love reads to me, softly or loudly.
**Malay:**
16 Yang membuat istana ini puas, 17 adalah Alfa dan Omega dari semua Kitab Suci 18 Cinta membacakan kepadaku, pelan atau keras.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 E io: «Per filosofici argomenti 26 e per autorità che quinci scende 27 cotale amor convien che in me si ’mprenti:
28 ché ’l bene, in quanto ben, come s’intende, 29 così accende amore, e tanto maggio 30 quanto più di bontate in sé comprende.
query.result:
**English:**
25 And I: "Through philosophical arguments 26 and through authority that descends from here 27 such love must be imprinted in me:
28 because good, insofar as it is understood as good, 29 thus kindles love, and all the more 30 the more goodness it comprises in itself.
**Malay:**
25 Dan aku: "Melalui argumen-argumen filosofis 26 dan melalui otoritas yang turun dari sini 27 cinta seperti itu harus tertanam dalam diriku:
28 karena kebaikan, sejauh dipahami sebagai kebaikan, 29 dengan demikian menyalakan cinta, dan terlebih lagi 30 semakin banyak kebaikan yang terkandung di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Dunque a l’essenza ov’ è tanto avvantaggio, 32 che ciascun ben che fuor di lei si trova 33 altro non è ch’un lume di suo raggio,
34 più che in altra convien che si mova 35 la mente, amando, di ciascun che cerne 36 il vero in che si fonda questa prova.
query.result:
**English:**
31 Therefore, in the essence where there is so much advantage, 32 that every good that is found outside of it 33 is nothing but a light of its ray,
34 more than in any other, it is fitting that the mind should be moved, 35 loving, of each one who discerns 36 the truth on which this proof is founded.
**Malay:**
31 Oleh itu, dalam esensi di mana terdapat begitu banyak kelebihan, 32 sehingga setiap kebaikan yang terdapat di luarnya 33 hanyalah cahaya dari sinarnya,
34 lebih daripada yang lain, sudah sepantasnya pikiran digerakkan, 35 dengan penuh cinta, oleh setiap orang yang memahami 36 kebenaran yang menjadi dasar pembuktian ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Tal vero a l’intelletto mïo sterne 38 colui che mi dimostra il primo amore 39 di tutte le sustanze sempiterne.
query.result:
**English:**
37 So true to my intellect did shine 38 he who shows me the first love 39 of all the eternal substances.
**Malay:**
37 Begitu benar bersinar pada intelekku 38 dia yang menunjukkan kepadaku cinta pertama 39 dari semua zat yang abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Sternel la voce del verace autore, 41 che dice a Moïsè, di sé parlando: 42 ‘Io ti farò vedere ogne valore’.
query.result:
**English:**
40 The voice of the true Author resounded, 41 who, speaking of himself, said to Moses: 42 ‘I will show you every value’.
**Malay:**
40 Suara pengarang yang sejati bergema, 41 yang, berbicara tentang dirinya sendiri, berkata kepada Musa: 42 ‘Aku akan menunjukkan kepadamu setiap nilai’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Sternilmi tu ancora, incominciando 44 l’alto preconio che grida l’arcano 45 di qui là giù sovra ogne altro bando».
query.result:
**English:**
43 Spread out your breast for me again, beginning 44 the lofty proclamation that the secret cries out 45 from here down there over every other edict.
**Malay:**
43 Bentangkan dadamu untukku lagi, mulailah 44 pujian agung yang diteriakkan oleh rahasia 45 dari sini ke bawah sana atas setiap perintah lainnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 E io udi’: «Per intelletto umano 47 e per autoritadi a lui concorde 48 d’i tuoi amori a Dio guarda il sovrano.
query.result:
**English:**
46 And I heard: “By human intellect 47 and by authority that agrees with it, 48 look to the sovereign of your love for God.
**Malay:**
46 Dan aku mendengar: “Dengan intelek manusia 47 dan dengan otoritas yang setuju dengannya, 48 pandanglah penguasa cintamu kepada Tuhan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Ma dì ancor se tu senti altre corde 50 tirarti verso lui, sì che tu suone 51 con quanti denti questo amor ti morde».
query.result:
**English:**
49 But tell me, do you feel other strings 50 pulling you towards him, so that you sound 51 with how many teeth this love bites you.
**Malay:**
49 Tetapi katakanlah lagi jika kamu merasakan tali-tali lain 50 menarikmu ke arahnya, sehingga kamu berbunyi 51 dengan berapa banyak gigi cinta ini menggigitmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Non fu latente la santa intenzione 53 de l’aguglia di Cristo, anzi m’accorsi 54 dove volea menar mia professione.
query.result:
**English:**
52 The holy intention of Christ's eagle was not hidden, 53 indeed I realized 54 where it wanted to lead my profession.
**Malay:**
52 Tidaklah tersembunyi niat suci sang elang Kristus, 53 bahkan kusadari 54 ke mana ia ingin membawa profesiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Però ricominciai: «Tutti quei morsi 56 che posson far lo cor volgere a Dio, 57 a la mia caritate son concorsi:
58 ché l’essere del mondo e l’esser mio, 59 la morte ch’el sostenne perch’ io viva, 60 e quel che spera ogne fedel com’ io,
61 con la predetta conoscenza viva, 62 tratto m’hanno del mar de l’amor torto, 63 e del diritto m’han posto a la riva.
query.result:
**English:**
55 But I began again: "All those torments 56 that can turn the heart to God, 57 have concurred with my love:
58 for the existence of the world and my own existence, 59 the death that He suffered so that I might live, 60 and that which every faithful man hopes for as I do,
61 with the aforementioned living knowledge, 62 have drawn me out of the sea of misguided love, 63 and have set me on the shore of the right path.
**Malay:**
55 Tetapi aku mulai lagi: "Semua siksaan itu 56 yang dapat membuat hati berpaling kepada Tuhan, 57 telah sesuai dengan kasih sayangku:
58 karena keberadaan dunia dan keberadaanku, 59 kematian yang ditanggung-Nya agar aku hidup, 60 dan apa yang diharapkan oleh setiap orang beriman sepertiku,
61 dengan pengetahuan hidup yang disebutkan sebelumnya, 62 telah menarikku keluar dari lautan cinta yang salah, 63 dan telah menempatkanku di tepi pantai jalan yang benar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Le fronde onde s’infronda tutto l’orto 65 de l’ortolano etterno, am’ io cotanto 66 quanto da lui a lor di bene è porto».
query.result:
**English:**
64 The leaves with which the whole garden of 65 the eternal gardener is adorned, I love so much 66 as the good that is given to them by him.
**Malay:**
64 Daun-daun yang menghiasi seluruh taman 65 tukang kebun abadi, sangat kucintai 66 sebagaimana kebaikan yang diberikan kepada mereka olehnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Sì com’ io tacqui, un dolcissimo canto 68 risonò per lo cielo, e la mia donna 69 dicea con li altri: «Santo, santo, santo!».
query.result:
**English:**
67 As soon as I was silent, a very sweet song 68 resounded through the sky, and my lady 69 said with the others: "Holy, holy, holy!"
**Malay:**
67 Begitu aku terdiam, sebuah nyanyian yang sangat merdu 68 bergema di langit, dan kekasihku 69 berkata bersama yang lain: "Kudus, kudus, kudus!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 E come a lume acuto si disonna 71 per lo spirto visivo che ricorre 72 a lo splendor che va di gonna in gonna,
73 e lo svegliato ciò che vede aborre, 74 sì nescïa è la sùbita vigilia 75 fin che la stimativa non soccorre;
76 così de li occhi miei ogne quisquilia 77 fugò Beatrice col raggio d’i suoi, 78 che rifulgea da più di mille milia:
79 onde mei che dinanzi vidi poi; 80 e quasi stupefatto domandai 81 d’un quarto lume ch’io vidi tra noi.
query.result:
**English:**
70 And as with a sharp light one wakes up 71 because of the visual spirit that runs 72 to the splendor that goes from skirt to skirt,
73 and the awakened one abhors what he sees, 74 so unaware is the sudden awakening 75 until the faculty of judgment does not come to the rescue;
76 so from my eyes every trifle 77 Beatrice chased away with the rays of hers, 78 that shone from more than a thousand miles away:
79 whence I saw more then than I had seen before; 80 and almost stunned I asked 81 about a fourth light that I saw among us.
**Malay:**
70 Dan seperti dengan cahaya yang tajam seseorang terbangun 71 karena roh visual yang berlari 72 ke cahaya yang berpindah dari rok ke rok,
73 dan orang yang terbangun itu membenci apa yang dilihatnya, 74 begitu tidak sadarnya kesadaran yang tiba-tiba 75 hingga kemampuan menilai tidak datang untuk menyelamatkan;
76 maka dari mataku setiap hal sepele 77 Beatrice usir dengan sinar-sinarnya, 78 yang bersinar dari lebih dari seribu mil jauhnya:
79 dari situ aku melihat lebih banyak daripada yang kulihat sebelumnya; 80 dan hampir tercengang aku bertanya 81 tentang cahaya keempat yang kulihat di antara kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 E la mia donna: «Dentro da quei rai 83 vagheggia il suo fattor l’anima prima 84 che la prima virtù creasse mai».
query.result:
**English:**
82 And my lady: "Within those rays 83 the soul gazes upon its maker 84 before the first virtue ever created it".
**Malay:**
82 Dan kekasihku: "Di dalam sinar-sinar itu 83 jiwa memandang penciptanya 84 sebelum kebajikan pertama pernah diciptakan".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Come la fronda che flette la cima 86 nel transito del vento, e poi si leva 87 per la propria virtù che la soblima,
88 fec’ io in tanto in quant’ ella diceva, 89 stupendo, e poi mi rifece sicuro 90 un disio di parlare ond’ ïo ardeva.
query.result:
**English:**
85 Like the branch that bends its top 86 in the passing of the wind, and then rises 87 by its own virtue that lifts it up,
88 so did I, while she was speaking, 89 in amazement, and then a desire to speak 90 with which I burned made me confident again.
**Malay:**
85 Seperti dahan yang melenturkan puncaknya 86 ketika angin berlalu, lalu bangkit 87 karena kekuatannya sendiri yang mengangkatnya,
88 begitulah yang kulakukan, sementara ia berbicara, 89 dengan takjub, dan kemudian hasrat untuk berbicara 90 yang membakarku membuatku percaya diri lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 E cominciai: «O pomo che maturo 92 solo prodotto fosti, o padre antico 93 a cui ciascuna sposa è figlia e nuro,
94 divoto quanto posso a te supplìco 95 perché mi parli: tu vedi mia voglia, 96 e per udirti tosto non la dico».
query.result:
**English:**
91 And I began: "O fruit who matured 92 only to be produced, O ancient father 93 to whom every bride is daughter and daughter-in-law,
94 as devoutly as I can I beseech you 95 to speak to me: you see my desire, 96 and in order to hear you I do not say it."
**Malay:**
91 Dan aku mulai: "Wahai buah yang matang 92 hanya untuk diproduksi, wahai ayah kuno 93 yang kepadanya setiap pengantin adalah anak perempuan dan menantu perempuan,
94 sekhidmat-khidmatnya yang aku mampu, aku memohon kepadamu 95 untuk berbicara kepadaku: engkau melihat keinginanku, 96 dan untuk mendengarmu aku tidak mengatakannya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Tu vuogli udir quant’ è che Dio mi puose 110 ne l’eccelso giardino, ove costei 111 a così lunga scala ti dispuose,
112 e quanto fu diletto a li occhi miei, 113 e la propria cagion del gran disdegno, 114 e l’idïoma ch’usai e che fei.
query.result:
**English:**
109 You want to hear how long God placed me 110 in the lofty garden, where she 111 prepared you for such a long ascent,
112 and how much delight was in my eyes, 113 and the real cause of the great disdain, 114 and the language that I used and that I made.
**Malay:**
109 Engkau ingin mendengar berapa lama Tuhan menempatkanku 110 di taman yang agung, di mana dia 111 mempersiapkanmu untuk pendakian yang begitu panjang,
112 dan betapa senangnya mataku, 113 dan penyebab sebenarnya dari kebencian yang besar, 114 dan bahasa yang kugunakan dan yang kubuat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Or, figluol mio, non il gustar del legno 116 fu per sé la cagion di tanto essilio, 117 ma solamente il trapassar del segno.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Now, my son, it was not the taste of the wood 116 that was in itself the cause of such exile, 117 but only the act of transgressing the boundary.
**Malay:**
115 Sekarang, anakku, bukan rasa kayu itu sendiri 116 yang menjadi penyebab pengasingan yang begitu lama, 117 tetapi hanya tindakan melewati batas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 La lingua ch’io parlai fu tutta spenta 125 innanzi che a l’ovra inconsummabile 126 fosse la gente di Nembròt attenta:
127 ché nullo effetto mai razïonabile, 128 per lo piacere uman che rinovella 129 seguendo il cielo, sempre fu durabile.
query.result:
**English:**
124 The language that I spoke was completely extinguished 125 before the people of Nimrod attempted the unfinished work:
126 for no rational effect, 127 because of the human pleasure that is renewed 128 following the heavens, was ever lasting.
**Malay:**
124 Bahasa yang kuucapkan telah punah sama sekali 125 sebelum orang-orang Nimrod mencoba pekerjaan yang belum selesai:
126 karena tidak ada efek rasional, 127 karena kesenangan manusia yang diperbarui 128 mengikuti surga, selalu tidak bertahan lama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Opera naturale è ch’uom favella; 131 ma così o così, natura lascia 132 poi fare a voi secondo che v’abbella.
query.result:
**English:**
130 It is natural for man to speak; 131 but in this way or that, nature leaves 132 it up to you to do as you please.
**Malay:**
130 Merupakan kodrat manusia untuk berbicara; 131 tetapi dengan cara ini atau itu, alam membiarkan 132 Anda melakukannya sesuai dengan keinginan Anda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Nel monte che si leva più da l’onda, 140 fu’ io, con vita pura e disonesta, 141 da la prim’ ora a quella che seconda,
142 come ’l sol muta quadra, l’ora sesta».
query.result:
**English:**
139 On the mountain that rises highest from the waves, 140 I was, with a life that was pure and yet dishonorable, 141 from the first hour to that which is second,
142 as the sun changes quadrant, the sixth hour.
**Malay:**
139 Di gunung yang menjulang paling tinggi dari ombak, 140 aku berada, dengan kehidupan yang murni namun tidak terhormat, 141 dari jam pertama hingga jam kedua,
142 saat matahari mengubah kuadran, jam keenam.
